alert.note: Alert for Jones; Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 7:55PM EDT until June 24 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jones County in eastern North Carolina... Northeastern Onslow County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 755 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Comfort, or 11 miles north of Half Moon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Maysville, Belgrade, Loco VFD, Pollocksville and Trenton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
